about_the_game:
‘Amikin Survival’ blends fierce survival gameplay with the thrill of magical creature collection. Here, Amikins—adorable yet fierce creatures—are your key to success, aiding in everything from combat to crafting. Catch and evolve diverse Amikins, manage resources, build your magical base, and survive in a world that offers endless adventures and challenges. It’s survival with a twist of fun—perfect for the hero in everyone!

🌟 Amikin Allies: Collect 'Em All! 🌟

Adventure into the wilderness to discover Amikins, mystical creatures with unmatched powers and quirky personalities. These faithful companions are key to your survival and success. As you gather your unique team, prepare for a blend of fun, strategy, and unexpected friendships that bring vibrancy to your quest.

🏠 Home Base Haven: Automate with Magic! 🏠

Transform your base from a simple shelter into a magical headquarters where your Amikins take the lead. Their unique abilities make managing your haven a breeze, automating tasks and adding a sprinkle of magic to your daily grind. Watch as your base evolves into a bustling hub of activity and enchantment, all thanks to your Amikin friends.

🧬 Power-Up Parade: Merge & Breed! 🧬

Unleash the full potential of your Amikins by merging the same kinds to amplify their strengths, and breed them to inherit the cream of the crop traits. This strategic play of power ensures your team is ready for anything, turning every Amikin into a champion in their own right. It's a fun, rewarding process that brings your squad closer to invincibility.

🚀 Epic Explorations: Fantasy Meets Sci-Fi! 🚀

Embark on a grand journey through 'Amikin Survival's sprawling world, rich with secrets and a blend of fantasy and sci-fi elements. Your arrival from another realm brings a unique mix of technology and magic to this mysterious land. Explore ancient ruins, dense forests, and everything in between, armed with futuristic gadgets and the magic of your Amikins.

😺 Meme Magic: Laughter Guaranteed! 😺

Dive into a game where cuteness, magic, and memes collide! 'Amikin Survival' brings humor to the forefront with adorable Amikins that love to keep things light and fun. Engage in whimsical adventures and share laughs over popular culture nods, ensuring your journey is filled with joy and giggles.

Are You Ready for an Unforgettable Adventure?

'Amikin Survival' awaits you, blending survival, strategy, and sheer fun in a magical world. Build your base, grow your Amikin team, and explore a vast realm where every day is a new adventure. Download now and start your epic journey filled with magic, challenges, and companionship. Your story in the world of 'Amikin Survival' begins today!

name: Amikin Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Explore the enchanting world of Amiterra, home to the cute yet formidable creatures known as Amikins! Dive into an open-world adventure where you can fight, farm, and build. Collect and evolve Amikins, construct your enchanted base, and embark on thrilling quests blending fantasy and sci-fi!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese
